channel.title: Boxman Recreated!
channel.description:
This thread is for my new game, Boxman Recreated. This is not Boxman like in my other thread, so you have no right to lock this one.
This game is VERY similar as far as graphics go, but the coding was rebuilt from the ground up. Not a bit of code was taken from the original.
FEATURES: Enemy path finding Enemy lock to grid Randomly Generated Maps Map Maker Map Loader Fixed Maps ^ Shock charges to Stun Enemy for 1 Second Bombs to Blow Up Barriers Sound!
Here are the downloads:
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman%20Recreated.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman%20Recreated.jar[/url] [Game] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Source.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Source.rar[/url] [Source]
Virus Scan: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLp9uZZxxnA[/youtube]
Have fun, leave feedback.
Current stage: Adding items to the in game information panel.
Please leave comments on features you would like to see!
